title: Riot HELP!
body:
Hey Riot!

Me and a couple of my friends seem to have issues with the client. 

_Issue 1_
We can't do anything in the shop. It won't let us in or buy anything

_Issue 2_

For some odd reason our chats aren't saying we are online or any of our friends are.

_Issue 3_
Everytime we log in it says its noticing a problem with the client/server.

We have reconnected our internet's. Reinstalled League, and even restarted our computers. Even my worldwide friends have had this issue. Do you guys notice it? If so, what do we do? Or are you fixing it?

Sincerely,

Summoner GamerAngel1997 {{champion:22}}

replies.body: There were some server issues last night, but everything should be fine now.  Stay up to date through the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page for any server issues.  Let me know if you or your friends still have any issues!
